This will be her 4th loan with MFP and she says she will make the payments on time. She is happy in her communal bank, since everyone supports each other. With the 1,000 nuevos soles, she will be able to buy sacks of fertilizer to maintain her crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: María Elena, tiene la edad  de 25 años, está casada,  vive con su  hijo y su esposo que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con el crédito lo que pretende es comprar utensilios para su soda. Ella alquilara un local donde desempeñar su profesión y lleva a cabo el proyecto pensado. Ella tiene como meta con este pequeño negocio generar la mayor de la clientela y tener los mayores ingresos para así mejorar su bienestar familiar y su estabilidad económica.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
María Elena is 25 years old.  She is married and lives with her son and husband who are her main priorities.  She plans to use her loan to buy utensils for her diner business.  She will hire premises for her business and carry out her planned project.  Her goal is to attract a large number of customers with this small business so that she can make more income and thereby improve her family's well-being and financial stability.

This is the first loan that María Elena has received from FUDECOSUR.  She has not received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered her this loan with better terms and much a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to invest in buying utensils for her diner

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is a single woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She is in the food vending business. Marissa makes cassava cakes and banana-cue (deep fried bananas coated in caramelized brown sugar). She also sells fried chicken to her community. 

Marissa started her business two years ago. She earns about PHP 2,000 per month. Marissa works hard to improve her income. She asked for a loan to buy flour, sugar, cassava, bananas, and chicken meat. Marissa hopes for this loan to help improve her business. Marissa is also planning to help send her brother and sister to school.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, cassava, bananas, and chicken meat

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es: Raquel, de 25 años, es una joven soltera. Vive en compañía de su Mamá Bertha y su hermana Jackelin, en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de El Tambo. Estudia ingeniería industrial en una universidad reconocida de la zona, le falta un año para terminar su carrera. Desea surgir y progresar por ello trabaja con ahínco. En las mañanas se dedica a trabajar en una empresa del estado, donde le pagan un sueldo mensual. Por las tardes ejerce el negocio familiar. Desde hace 4 años brinda el servicio de lavandería, su madre le enseñó a quitar todo tipo de manchas en las prendas de vestir y de esa manera  lava docenas de ropa que por el tiempo debilitaban su salud, es así que decide comprarse una maquina lavadora. En la actualidad cuenta con 2, y que gracias a este implementó ofrece servicio de lavado y puede ahorrar tiempo, energías y abastecerse más; para seguir ofreciendo su servicio con calidad. Tiene bastante demanda de su servicio de lavado por lo que le es muy necesario tener otra maquina lavadora, que piensa comprar más adelante. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “porvenir 2 de mayo” y este es el onceavo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Raquel de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de anaqueles y materiales para remodelar su espacio de trabajo.
texts.en:
Raquel, age 25, is a young single woman. She lives with her mother Bertha and her sister Jackelin in their own house, which is in the town of El Tambo. She studies industrial engineering at a recognized university in the area, and she has one year left to complete her degree. She wants to rise up and make progress, so she works very hard.

In the mornings Raquel works at a state-owned company, where they pay her a monthly salary. In the afternoons she works in the family business. For four years she has offered laundry services; her mother taught her to remove all kinds of stains from clothing, so she washed dozens of items and with time the work affected her health. This is how she decided to buy a washing machine. She now has two, and thanks to these appliances she offers laundry services and can save time, energy and can stock up more to continue offering high-quality service.There is enough demand for her laundry service that she really needs to have another washing machine, and she is thinking about buying one in the future.

Raquel belongs to the “Porvenir 2 de mayo” (The Future of May 2) communal bank, and this is her eleventh loan with MFP, so she hopes for your collaboration to help her continue with her goals. In turn, she promises to make her payments. She is also grateful to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible and have strong ties to each other. If Raquel receives your support, she will invest the money in buying shelves and materials to remodel her work space.

loans.use: to buy shelves and materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy summer clothing to sell.

loans.name: Maria Auxilio

texts.es: María es una mujer de 52 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de comidas su historia comenzó hace 4 años cuando un familiar le regalo un capital para trabajar y de ahí continuo trabajando actualmente trabaja con D-MIRO, trabaja solo todos los días de las 6de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche por las noches la venta de comida, no tiene dificultades, no está casada, tiene 2 hijos y estudian en la escuela fiscal, su sueño es incrementar su negocio y tener un asadero amplio y que sus hijos hayan realizado sus estudios. Por eso quiere el préstamo para invertir en su tienda y venta de comida.
texts.en: María is a 52-year-old woman who has many aspirations for the coming years in terms of helping her food business to prosper.  Her story began four years ago when a family member gave her some capital with which to work.  She continues working and works together with D-MIRO.  She works alone every day of the week, from 6.00am to 10.00pm.  In the evenings she sells food.  She does not experience any problems.  María is not married.  She has two children who attend school.  Her dream is to increase her business and to have a large rotisserie business.  She would also like to see her children complete their studies.  For this reason, she would like a loan to invest in her store and her food sales business.

loans.use: to buy products for her food store and her fast food business

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en:
Ligaya is 44 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Ligaya has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Ligaya has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Ligaya hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages to sell

loans.name: Esmaelita

texts.en:
Esmaelita is 59 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Esmaelita has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for 11 years. She requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Esmaelita has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Esmaelita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for sell

loans.name: Martina

texts.en:
46-year-old Martina is a sari-sari (variety) store owner from Trinidad, Bohol. She is married and has seven children aged between 10 and 23 years. Her husband works as a fisherman.

Martina has had her store for ten years. She sells items like powdered juice, toiletries, and snacks. She also supports her husband's fishing by selling his catch at the market. Martina does her best to support her family. She asked for a loan to buy fishing nets and more items to sell such as canned goods, instant noodles, and snacks.

In the future, Martina hopes for her family to have a better quality of life and for her children to finish college and find jobs.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and more items to sell such as canned goods, instant noodles, and snacks.

loans.name: Jerry Alberto

texts.es: Jeery es un joven estudiante de la carrera de Ingeniería Civil, está solicitando el crédito para pagar el curso de finalización de estudios. El trabaja actualmente como Ingeniero Residente en una fundación. La mayor inspiración que Jerry tiene son sus padres, porque a pesar de todas las dificultades han hecho un esfuerzo muy grande por salir adelante y darle una carrera profesional. Espera llegar a ser un profesional responsable y capaz de realizar todas las actividades que se le pidan.
texts.en: Jerry is a young student who is pursuing a degree in Civil Engineering.  He is requesting a loan so that he can pay to complete his degree.  He currently works as a resident engineer at a foundation.  Jerry's biggest inspiration is his parents because, in spite of all the difficulties, they have made a very big effort to do well in life and provide him with a professional career.  He hopes to become a responsible professional who is able to carry out all the activities that are asked of him.

loans.use: to pay to complete his degree

loans.name: Massiel Indira

texts.es: Massiel dentro de algunos años se ve ocupando el cargo de contador de una empresa, actividad que será ejercida gracias a sus estudios de contabilidad. El crédito que está solicitando es para pagar el curso para poder finalizar su carrera. Es una persona responsable con mucha dedicación hacia sus estudios y quiere crecer profesionalmente, prueba de eso es haber podido poder costear su carrera universitaria por sus propios medios, contando siempre con el apoyo moral de su mamá.
texts.en: In a few years time, Massiel sees herself working as an accountant in a company.  This is a job she will carry out thanks to her accountancy studies.  Massiel is requesting a loan to pay to complete her degree.  She is a responsible person who is very committed to her studies and wants to grow professionally.  Proof of this lies in the fact that she has been able to pay for her University degree with her own resources, always relying on the moral support of her mom.

loans.use: to pay to complete her degree

loans.name: Ileana Isabel

texts.es: Su mayor sueño en la vida es concluir su carrera con éxito para desempeñarse como una excelente profesional en el futuro y darle un mejor estilo de vida a mi familia, porque quiere darles lo mejor y también una buena educación a su hija. El crédito lo está solicitando para pagar el curso de titulación de su carrera Ingeniería en Sistemas. La situación económica ha sido siempre un problema para ella, pero ha salido adelante poco a poco y ay está en la última etapa de su carrera, y después podrá desempeñarse en su campo laboral.
texts.en: Ileana's biggest dream in life is to successfully complete her degree so that she can work as a great professional in the future and provide her family with a better lifestyle.  She would like to provide her family with the best and provide her daughter with a good education.  Ileana is requesting this loan to pay to complete her degree in Systems Engineering.  Her financial situation has always been a problem but she has gradually managed to make progress and is now in the final stages of her degree course.  When she finishes, she will be able to work in her field.

loans.use: to pay to complete her degree

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de la ciudad de Encarnacion surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundación, ellas se encuentran en el 14 ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año 2008.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Gladys, ella es de profesión modista y se dedica a la confección de prendas para damas en su domicilio.  Cuenta que gracias a la buena calidad de las prendas que hace, ya ha podido formarse una muy buena clientela, que siempre acude hasta ella para darle trabajo. Su meta es poder tener un taller amplio donde pueda emplear a otras personas.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos y demás insumos, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando en su taller. Todas las miembros están muy agradecidas por la ayuda de la fundación.
texts.en:
This group in the city of Encarnación came about through a contact with one of the Foundation members. They are in their 14th loan cycle, and have been  working with the Foundation since 2008. 

One of the members of the group is Gladys. She is a dressmaker by trade, and makes articles of women's clothing in her home. She tells us that thanks to the good quality of the clothing she makes, she has been able to develop a very good clientele, who are always coming to her to give her work. Her goal is to be able to have a spacious workshop, where she can employ other people. 

She is applying for the loan to buy fabric, thread, and other supplies, so that she can continue working in her workshop. All the members are very grateful for the Foundation's help.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, and other materials needed for her workshop.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan  de 54 años  tiene una pequeña fábrica de bollos de maíz; él vive con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en las edades de 18 y 19 años, a quienes sueña con verlos convertidos en profesionales exitosos y él trabaja para ello.  Su actividad inició cuando por tradición familiar, se dedicó a elaborar amasijos de maíz envueltos en hojas y amarrados con pita, para sostener su familia y bien que lo ha logrado,  pues ya tiene un hijo que se perfila como profesional y los otros dos van por ese camino en lo que les gusta. Sus ventas las realiza desde su casa, de contado y a crédito; además de tener un punto comercial en la puerta de un supermercado muy conocido de la ciudad y cercano al sitio de producción Su máxima es que su negocio se fortalezca cada día mas y que sus hijos sean profesionales prestigiosos. Su mayor desafío es el insuficiente capital de trabajo, ante la demanda del mercado que cada día crece, él quiere comprar en mayor volumen para obtener descuentos. Esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas e insumos, para incrementar  la producción y potencializar el acceso a nuevos clientes entre tiendas, graneros y puntos comerciales, además  invertirá  en adecuaciones de su patio donde estará ubicado el área productiva, con mayor orden, lo que generará mayor eficiencia en la tarea..
texts.en: 54-year-old Juan has a small factory where he makes 'bollos de maiz'.  He lives together with his wife and his three children who are 18 and 19 years old.  He dreams of seeing his children become successful professionals and this is what he is working towards.  Juan's business was born when, through family tradition, he started making 'bollos de maiz' (a corn mixture, wrapped in leaves and tied with twine), in order to support his family.  He has achieved his goal as he has one son who is nearly a professional and the other two are also on this path, in a field they enjoy.  Juan makes his sales from home, for cash and on credit.  He also has a sales location outside a very well-known supermarket in the city, near his production site.  Juan's goal is to further strengthen his business every day and for his children to become well-respected professionals.  His greatest challenge is a lack of sufficient working capital when faced with growing demand.  He would like to buy in larger volumes so that he can obtain discounts.  This is precisely why he is applying for a Kiva loan (his first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo).  He will use it to buy raw materials and supplies, so that he can increase his production and improve his access to new customers through stores, grocery stores and other sales locations.  He will also invest in making some structural improvements in his patio which is where his production area is located.  This will allow him to carry out his work more efficiently.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and to invest in making structural improvements to his patio where his production area is located

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.en:
Benjamin is 47 years old, widowed, and has two children.  He lives in the Philippines. Benjamin has a food shop that sells fruit salad, ice, candy, and  homemade sausages or chorizo. He has had this business for 10 years. 

Benjamin is requesting a loan for 7,000 PHP, which he will use to buy raw ingredients needed for making snacks and homemade sausages. He has been a member of HSPFI for since 2011.  In the future, Benjamin hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to pruchase raw ingredients needed for making snacks and homemade sausages.

loans.name: Koem

texts.en:
Mr. Koem is 58 years old and a loving father of six children. He permanently lives with his family in the Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province. He is now in two businesses, as a rice cultivator and a wooden house constructor. However, his daily income is commonly earned from rice husbandry. 

In order to reduce some expenses day after day, Koem would like to request his fifth loan from HKL as well as his first loan from Kiva to purchase a used motorcycle. Presently his family doesn’t own any vehicles yet. 

This loan will help to improve his living conditions. Koem hopes to raise his family out of poverty some day through his effort.

loans.use: to purchase a used motorcycle.

loans.name: Glenn

texts.en:
Glenn is 30 years old, married, and has three children. He lives in Aloran, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Glenn operates a coconut production business, which he has been doing for five years. He earns 10,000 PHP a month.

Glenn is requesting a loan for 40,000 PHP, which he will use to pay for services to increase his crop yield. Glenn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his business and living situation. In the future, Glenn wants to save a reserve for future emergencies and to purchase additional farm land.

loans.use: to pay for services to increase his crop yield.

loans.name: Shiony

texts.en:
Shiony is twenty-four years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children.
 
Shiony has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She is also selling clothes like t-shirts and blouses. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Shiony has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Shiony hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy snacks, beverages and canned goods.

loans.name: Precella

texts.en:
Thirty-three-year-old Precella is a married woman with four children aged nine, six, four and one. She and her husband are both farmers. They till a land in Trinidad, Bohol and grow rice crops to sell. Precella's husband mainly manages their farm. Precella on the other hand, manages their sari-sari store to help augment their family income.

Precella has asked for a loan to purchase fertilizers and store items and pay for labor. Precella hopes this loan will help her and her husband provide a better future for their children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and store items and pay for labor.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has ten children. 

Rosa has a shop that sells green bananas by the kilogram. She is also making and selling curtains. She has had this business for twenty years. She requested a loan for PHP 6,000 to buy stocks of bananas for resale.

Rosa has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of bananas for resale.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is married and has seven children. 

Gloria has a shop that sells both green and yellow bananas by the kilogram.  She has been in business for 22 years.  She has requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to increase her stock of bananas to sell.

Gloria has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Gloria hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy bananas to sell.

loans.name: Yen

texts.en:
Yen, 53, lives in Ho Chi Minh City. She has her own house and lives with her husband and two children. Her husband works as a welder. 

Yen has a small food stall in front of her house to sell beef noodles to her customers in her local community. She started this business over ten years ago. 

She intends to expand her business by taking a loan to buy more kinds of food and ingredients to make better food, and so be able to attract more customers. With the capital investment, she believes it will help her have more profits to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more kinds of food and ingredients to make better food and so be able to attract more customers.

loans.name: Bernadith

texts.en:
Bernadith is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is married and has three children. 

Bernadith has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has been in business for five years.  She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to increase her stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Bernadith has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Bernadith hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is 33 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is married and has three children. 

Maribel has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages.  She has been in business for eight years.  She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to increase her stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Maribel has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Maribel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Grece Lorena

texts.es: Con su anterior credikiva, Grece compró ropa infantil, calzado escolar y juguetes que vendió muy pronto y ganó dinero. A ella le fue muy bien y en consecuencia a su familia, por eso ahora está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual se preparará para la temporada escolar, pues las madres de familia desde ya mostraron las listas de útiles y ella venderá cuadernos, papelería, boligrafos, colores, temperas, borradores, cartulinas etc. Grece envia el siguiente mensaje a los fianciadoresd e Kiva : " Estoy muy agradecida por la ayuda recibida y la mejor manera de demostrarselos es pagando puntualmente. "
texts.en: With her previous Kiva loan, Grece bought baby clothes, shoes for school and toys that she sold quickly and made money on. It went really well for her and, consequently, for her family. That’s why she is now requesting a new loan so she can prepare for the new school season. Mothers have already shown her the lists of school supplies and she’d like to buy notebooks, paper, pens, colored pencils, paint, erasers, etc. Grece sends the following message to Kiva funders: “I’m very grateful for the help I’ve received and the best way to show it is by paying punctually.”

loans.use: buy notebooks, paper, pens, colored pencils, paint and erasers.

loans.name: Gaudence

texts.en: Gaudence is forty-two years old. She has four children, all of whom go to school. She has a boutique which she has been running for the past two years. She will use the loan she has requested to buy more items to sell in the boutique. Gaudence has a plan to build a house from the profits she will obtain from the business.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell in the boutique.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is twenty-five years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children. 

Mary Grace has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Mary Grace is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Mary Grace hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy, forty, is a married woman with two children. Her husband repairs old motorcycles to earn a living. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Thuy supports her family by selling spare parts and helps her husband to maintain his business. She has done this for over five years. Thuy is requesting a loan to purchase more spare parts and equipment that will enable her to meet her customers' demands. She hopes that this will assist her and her husband to make a higher income and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase more spare parts and equipment to sell from her store.

loans.name: Nhung

texts.en:
Nhung is thirty-seven years old and married. Her husband earns money by maintaining and repairing sewing machines. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Nhung earns a living by making clothes. She intends to take a loan to buy good quality fabric and sewing materials. This will enable her to better meet her customers' needs. Nhung hopes that her business will run smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy good quality fabric and sewing materials.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is thirty-five years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with six children. 

Merlyn has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Merlyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Merlyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Adelia

texts.en:
Adelia is forty-seven years old and is married. She has four children who are in school.

Adelia is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Adelia requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Adelia has been raising pigs for ten years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Adelia would like to save money to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Tham

texts.en:
Tham is thirty-five years old and married. She lives with her husband and two children in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband works as a painter and truck driver for hire. She earns a living sewing clothes, which she has done for five years.

Tham would like to take out a loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of fabric and sewing materials. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and attract additional customers. She also hopes that through the loan her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and enable her to save money for her children's education.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety and quantity of fabric and sewing materials.

loans.name: Lim

texts.en:
Mrs. Lim, aged forty, is an industrious mother of three lovely children, two of whom are students and depend on her. She is involved in the agricultural business in Prey Chor district. 

Presently she owns a few pieces of farmland, which she has received from her ancestors, to produce rice crops. However, the output she gets from it seems not enough for the whole family. To solve the problem, Lim decided to acquire some funds from HKL, a longstanding Kiva partner, to purchase a plot of farmland from a villager. She hopes that she’ll be able pursue a better standard of living by using the loan from our lenders.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of farmland from a villager.

loans.name: Roque

texts.en:
Roque runs a "habal-habal" (motorcycle taxi) business in San Miguel, Bohol. He is thirty-two years old, married, with two children aged eight and seven. 

Roque has had his business for four years. He earns 5,000 PHP per month. Roque works hard to build his business and earn a better income. He said that his top priority is his children's education.

Roque has asked for a loan to buy motorcycle spare parts and pay for a tune-up service. Roque hopes this loan will help to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts and pay for a tune-up service.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa is a sixty-four-year-old married woman who lives in Panalsalan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She has five children living with her. 

Josefa used her last loan to purchase materials needed in her nipa-making business (palm-frond weaving). Her business is successful, and she's taking a new loan to pay for the labor cost in nipa-making. In the future she hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to pay for the labor cost in nipa-making

loans.name: Rossel

texts.en:
Rossel is twenty-nine years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 

Rossel has a food shop that sells dressed chicken by the kilogram. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of dressed chicken to sell. Rossel has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Rossel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of dressed chicken to sell.

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is married with nine children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Mercedita is forty-two years old and five of her children are in school.

Mercedita has a business selling firewood in the Philippines. Mercedita requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy more firewood to sell.

Mercedita has been in this business for six years. In the future, Mercedita would like to save money to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to sell.

loans.name: Janeth Adela

texts.es:
Janeth es una mujer de 37 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de comidas rápidas. 

Su historia comenzó cuando le fiaron la carreta y D-MIRO presto el dinero para pagarla y comprar mesas y sillas, trabaja juntos con sus hijos todos los días, sus dificultades son los ladrones, no está casado, si tiene 2 hijos. 

su sueño es tener un restaurante para vender desayunos y almuerzos. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su negocio de comidas rápidas y comprar mesas, sillas, insumos para las comidas.
texts.en:
Janeth is 37 years old and has great plans for the success of her fast food business in the coming years.

Her story began when D-MIRO lent her the money to purchase her food cart along with some tables and chairs. She is not married and she works with her two children every day. Her biggest problem is thieves stealing from her. With this loan she intends to invest in her fast food business by buying tables, chairs and supplies to make her meals.
Her dream is to have a restaurant which serves breakfasts and lunches.

loans.use: to purchase tables, chairs and supplies.

loans.name: Muborak

texts.ru: Муборак занимается торговлей. Ей 55 лет. Она имеет торговую точку, где продает парфюмерию, бижутерии и заколки. Этим видом деятельности занимается 15 лет. Она разведена. У нее четверо детей. Муборак берет кредит для приобретения шампуней, косметики, духов, туалетной воды и мыла.
texts.en: Muborak is a retailer. She is 55 years old. She has a stall where she sells perfumes, jewellery and hair clips. Muborak has been doing this for 15 years. She is divorced and has four children. Muborak is taking this loan to purchase shampoos, cosmetics, perfumes, eau de toilette and soap.

loans.use: to purchase shampoos, cosmetics, perfumes, eau de toilette and soap

loans.name: Tianita

texts.en:
Tianita is married with five children. Tianita is forty-three-years-old and lives in the Philippines. Tianita operates a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She's been doing this for four years and every month she earn PHP 5,000 from this work. 

She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. This year, Tianita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Tianita hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business.

loans.name: Khoang

texts.en:
Khoang earns a living by selling enamelled tiles and bricks. He’s forty-one and married with two daughters and lives in Ho Chi Minh City.

He and his wife have earned an income through their business selling enamelled tiles and bricks for ten years. He is currently asking for a loan to purchase a larger quantity of bricks and tiles in bulk. This will enable him to better meet the needs of his customers. His goal is to increase his sales and income from his business in order to better meet his family's needs and save money for his children's education.

loans.use: To purchase a larger quantity of bricks and tiles in bulk.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en: Now Emma is borrowing PHP 45,000 to fund her purified drinking water business. The purified drinking water and clothing sales retail business that she previously funded through NWTF and Kiva continues to provide for her and her family, to increase their income and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of purified drinking water for resale.

loans.name: Casiana

texts.en:
Casiana is forty-five years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 

Casiana has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for twenty years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Casiana is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Casiana hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Lien

texts.en:
Lien is a thirty-eight-year-old married woman with three sons. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Lien's husband is a brick layer.

She earns a living by running a food stall, from which she has been selling beef noodles for six years. Lien would like to take a loan to buy good quality beef and ingredients to make better food. She hopes this will enable her to attract additional customers. She also hopes that through the loan, her business will generate a higher income, which will help her to improve her family's living conditions and enable her to save money for her children's education.

loans.use: To buy good quality beef and ingredients to make better food to sell.

loans.name: Annabel

texts.en:
Annabel works hard to support her family. Annabel is married and has a recycled materials business in the Philippines.

Annabel requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more recycled materials to sell. Annabel has been in this business for seven years now, and also earns additional income from a variety store and raising livestock.

In the future, Annabel would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more recycled materials to sell.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
Kuña Guapa se denomina el excelente grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Itá Actualmente está integrado por 21 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 5° ciclo, en forma conjunta y dentro de un ambiente de ayuda y cooperación.
Marina es una de las miembros de este grupo. Ella se define como una persona muy trabajadora y por sobre todo emprendedora. Ella se dedica a la venta de lencerías, ya sea de hombres o mujeres, comenta que ha logrado formarse una buena clientela, debido a que siempre tiene muy buena variedad. Su sueño es poder tener un negocio amplio donde pueda vender sus productos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de lencerías, con lo cual podrá cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes y tener más en stock.
texts.en:
This excellent group of women is called the Kuña Guapa Group, and they are in the city of Itá. They currently are made up of 21 women who are happily working together with their fifth loan in an environment of help and cooperation.

Marina is one of the members of this group. She describes herself as a very hard-working person who, above all, is enterprising. She works selling lingerie and men's underwear. She shares that she has gotten a good client base due to always having a lot of variety. Her dream is to be able to have an expanded place of business where she can sell her products. She is asking for a loan to buy lingerie so she can fill her customers' orders and have more in stock.

loans.use: buy lingerie for resale

loans.name: Oanh

texts.en:
Oanh is 42 years old.  She is married and lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her husband and three children.  Her husband helps her manage a business selling beverages.

Oanh has run the business for twelve years.  She would like to obtain a loan to increase her stock of beverages to better meet her customers' needs.   Oanh hopes her business will ensure that her family members have a better life.

loans.use: to increase her stock of beverages and meet her customers' needs.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a married woman with two children. Juliet is forty years old, and resides in Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Juliet owns and operates a farm, planting harvesting rice for sale to earn a living. She's been doing this business for 5 years, and each month she earns PHP 7,000 from it. 

Juliet requested a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase fertilizers such as manure. This year, Juliet joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Juliet wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

loans.name: Arsenia

texts.en:
Arsenia is forty-four years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Arsenia has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Arsenia is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Arsenia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia works hard to support her family. Antonia has a common-law husband and has a coconut crafting business in the Philippines.

Antonia requested a PHP 27,000 loan through NWTF to buy more materials that she needs for her coconut crafting business. Antonia has been in this business for ten years.

In the future, Antonia would like to build and expand her business to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more materials that she needs for her coconut crafting business.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is forty-one years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Gina has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Gina is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Gina hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is forty-eight years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Angelita is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy more feed and vitamins for her livestock. Angelita has been raising pigs for ten years and also earns additional income from frozen foods.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more feed and vitamins for her livestock.

loans.name: Hieu

texts.en:
Hieu, a thirty-three-year-old married woman with two children, lives in Ho Chi Minh City. She runs a business that sells pork noodles to people in the local community. Her husband works as a driver for hire.

She requests a loan to purchase good food and some equipment for her food stall. This will enable her to offer better food to her customers. She hopes her business will run smoothly and she can earn additional income to reinvest in her business and save for emergencies.

loans.use: To purchase good food and some equipment for her food stall.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is fifty-five years old and married with two children. Angelita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Angelita has borrowed and paid for six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and also earns an income from e-loading and a room-rental business.

Angelita aspires to save enough money to build and expand her boarding house.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Cuc

texts.en:
Cuc is a sixty-year-old widowed woman. She has two children and lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She earns a living by running a general store in front of their house.

Cuc has been in business for six years. She would like to take a loan to purchase a variety of different products such as soft drinks and confectionery to stock her store. This will enable her to offer a better range of products to her customers. She hopes her business will run smoothly and she can earn additional income to reinvest in her shop and save for emergencies.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of different products such as soft drinks and confectionery to stock her store.

loans.name: Rina

texts.es:
Rina, de 39 años, es una mujer muy luchadora y no le teme a los retos que le pone la vida. Ella es madre soltera de Jamin de 12 años y a quien cría y educa sola. Juntas vive en casa de su madre a lado de ella. Desde muy temprano Rina, se dirige al puerto de la ciudad, en busca de comprar los mejores granos y productos de la región, como el pescado seco, maíz, arroz y todo con lo que pueda comercializar, ya que su trabajo consiste en enviar a la sierra estos productos para su comercialización. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por tres años y le esta yendo muy bien.
Durante el periodo que lleva realizando su trabajo aprendió muchas cosas y todas las experiencias que ha tenido le enseñaron a tener mas cuidado con algunos productos e invertir en otros, aunque al principio le fue muy complicado poder aprender todo el negocio. Espera seguir trabajando mucho, ya que su anhelo es brindar una profesión a su hija, además desea tener un almacén en la ciudad donde pueda comprar y vender productos como lo hace. Este será el crédito número 5 con MFP, por tanto esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá mas segura de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas y no dejar mal al grupo tan bueno que le esta dando la oportunidad de incrementar su capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, aumentará su capital de trabajo y con esto comprará más productos.
texts.en:
Rina is 39, and a very determined woman who is fearless in dealing with life's challenges. She is the single mother of Jamin, 12, who she raising and educating on her own. She lives with her mother, in her mother's home.  Early in morning, Rina heads to the city's port, looking to buy the best grains and produce of the region, such as dried fish, corn, rice, and everything she can sell. Her work consists of sending these products to the highlands to be sold. 

She has been doing this work for three years, and it's going very well. During the time she has been doing this work, she has learned many things. All the experiences she has had have taught her to be more careful with some products, and to invest in others, although in the beginning she found it complicated learning about the whole business.  

She hopes to continue working hard, as her greatest desire is to offer her daughter the opportunity to have a profession. In addition, she wishes to have a store in the city, where she can buy and sell products as she has been doing. 

This will be her fifth loan with MFP, so she is very happy to know that she will receive a loan, so she will feel more confident of progressing with her work. Moreover, she promises to make her instalment payments, and not to let down such a good group that is giving her the opportunity to increase her working capital. 

With the amount of 1,500 soles applied for, she will increase her working capital, and with this, buy more products.

loans.use: To buy more dried fish, rice, and legumes.

loans.name: Elio Rigail

texts.es:
Elio es un hombre de 53 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de canguil. 

Su historia comenzó hace 30 año comenzó con el negocio lo heredo de su papa él se dedicaba a esta actividad y decidió emprender solo, trabaja todos los días le ayuda en casa su esposa trabaja desde las 5:00AM hasta las 12:00PM, no tiene dificultades, si está casado, si tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad y una 16 años estudia en colegio fiscal. 

Su sueño es seguir incrementando en su negocio como lo ha hecho en los créditos anteriores y con lo que va recaudando va remodelando su casa. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar canguil y mejorar sus ventas en su carrito.
texts.en:
Elio, 53, aspires to prosper in the next few years with his popcorn business.

His story starts 30 years ago, when he inherited the business from his father who was in this line of work. He decided to take it over and works alone every day. At home, his wife works from 5am to noon. He doesn’t have any problems. He’s married and has 2 sons, who are of the age of majority, and a 16-year old daughter who’s in school.

His dream is to continue increasing his sales, as he’s done with the previous loans, and with the income he makes, he renovates his home. That’s why he’s requesting a loan to buy popcorn and improve sales from his cart.

loans.use: buy popcorn.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru: Дилором замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Она очень добрая и честная женщина. Более 18 лет она занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции. Она выращивает лук, пшеницу, ячмень и картофель. В бизнесе помогает старший сын.  Получив хороший урожай, она планирует продавать за выгодную цену и сделать хорошую прибыль, чтобы оплатить обучение своего сына в университете, так как ей очень трудно содержать свою семью одной. Её супруг уехал на заработки в Россию. Дилором хотела бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для ремонта своего жилого дома. Она заранее благодарна вам за вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Dilorom is married and a loving mother of three children. She is a very kind and honest woman. For over 18 years she has been growing crops such as onions, wheat, barley and potatoes. Her oldest son helps her with the business. Once she collects the harvest, Dilorom plans to sell it at a good price and make a sufficient profit to pay for her son's university education. It is difficult for her to support her family on her own, as her husband is currently working in Russia. Dilorom would like to obtain a loan of 5000 somoni to repair her home. She thanks you in advance for your kindness and good will.

loans.use: to repair her house

loans.name: Babygirl

texts.en:
Babygirl is 27 years old and she is married.   She works very hard to provide for her family.

Babygirl runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as soap, sugar and other groceries.  She has requested a loan of 13,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her store. 

Babygirl would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is 57 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is married and has three children. 

Narcisa operates a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members in order to earn a living.  She has been in business for five years and every month she earns 8,000 PHP from this work.  She has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to repair a vehicle used in her business. 

In 2010, Narcisa joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve both her business and her living situation.  In the future, Narcisa hopes to improve her family’s general living conditions.

loans.use: to repair a vehicle used in her transportation business.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en: This time Clarita is borrowing PHP 25,000 to fund her tailoring business. The tailoring business that she previously funded through Kiva partner NWTF continues to provide Clarita and her family with income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Cresenciana

texts.en:
Cresenciana is fifty-nine years old and married. Cresenciana works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like soft-drinks, canned goods and other groceries.

Cresenciana has borrowed and paid for fifteen loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from hog raising.

Cresenciana aspires to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more items like soft-drinks, canned goods and other groceries.

loans.name: Ciriaca

texts.en:
Ciriaca works hard to support her family. She is single and has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

Ciriaca requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. She has been in this business for two years.

In the future, Ciriaca would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Marife

texts.en:
Marife is twenty-two years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with one child. Marife has a shop that sells variety of bananas per kilogram. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of bananas to sell.

Marife is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Marife hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of bananas to sell.

loans.name: Song

texts.en:
Mrs. Song is aged fifty-three and lives in Prey Chor district, where common businesses are crops growing, animal husbandry and fishing. She has a life partner in her husband who works in the same business as a rice cultivator. She has been blessed with seven children. Most of her children are already married and live separately. 

She will use this loan amount to partially fix her present house. This house was built a long time ago, so the thatched roof and the walls are damaged. She is very grateful for the loan given to her to fix her house.

loans.use: to partially fix her present house.

loans.name: Sorn

texts.en:
Mrs. Sorn is a thirty-two-year-old married woman who resides in Kompong Cham province, Cambodia. She is a local rice farmer in the province and she also takes some time to work as domestic laborer on a plantation. Normally, she is able to generate an average of $5.00 per day to meet her financial needs. Her husband shares the responsibilities by working as construction worker around the province. 

Mrs. Sorn is taking out this loan in order to purchase two cows for her farming project. She said that she won't need to hire other animals again so her expenses will be reduced. In the future, she wishes to fix and decorate some parts of her house. Most importantly, she will give a constant support to her children until they finish senior-high school.

loans.use: to purchase two cows for her farming project.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 23 años es una mujer joven muy amable y buena, es conviviente con Estalin de 27 años con quien tiene un pequeño hijo llamado Víctor de 4 años. Ella vive en su casa propia a lado de su conviviente y su menor hijo a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Rosa se dedica a la venta de ropa femenina, entre los productos que tiene en venta nunca falta la lencería fina pues es su mercado que le permite tener mas ganancias. Cuando termina de hacer sus labores en su hogar sale en busca de sus amigas, vecinas, familiares y publico que desee comprar variedad y calidad. Lleva realizando su trabajo por un año y le ha permitido poder aumentar sus ingresos y conocer gente nueva que le abre las puertas a nuevos productos que ofrecer. Le agrada mucho su negocio pues no le es muy esforzado y le permite brindar el tiempo suficiente a su menor hijo. Tiene mucho clientes que son muy exigente y es por eso que ella siempre se esfuerza en comprar lo mejor para así tenerlos siempre satisfechos. Espera seguir con éste negocio y empezar a vender otro tipo de prendas para así aumentar sus ingresos. Este será el crédito número 1 con MFP, por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual y espera compenetrarse rápidamente con su banco comunal del cual tiene muy buenas referencia por el compañerismo y solidaridad que existe entre ellos. Con el monto solicitado 600 soles, comprará mas variedad de ropa ya que desea ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rosa is a young and lovely woman. She is 23 years old and lives in her own home with her 27 year old partner, Estalin, and their 4 year old son, Victor, who she hopes to provide for with a good standard of living.
Rosa sells women's clothes including fine lingerie as better quality merchandise helps her to increase her earnings. When she has finished her work in the home, she goes out in search of her friends, neighbours, relatives and other people who might wish to buy such variety and quality. She has been doing this for a year and has managed to increase her earnings as well as meet new people who have opened doors to new products for her range.
She is very thankful for her business as it is not too demanding and it allows her to spend enough time with her young son. She has many demanding clients and so she always goes the extra mile to keep them happy by finding the best garments for them. She hopes to continue with this business and also to start selling other garments to further increase her profits.
This will be her first loan with MFP and she hopes that this collaboration will help her to finalise her plans. Furthermore, she is committed to fulfilling her repayment schedule in a timely manner and she hopes to familiarise herself quickly with the members of her communal bank, who are well known for the sense of comradeship and solidarity which exists among them. With the sum of 600 soles borrowed, she will buy more clothing as she would like to offer a greater variety of items to her customers.

loans.use: To buy more clothing.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru: Шухрат женат и любящий отец четверых детей. Он очень опытный с большим стажем слесарь- жестянщик. Данный бизнес он унаследовал от отца. На продуктовом рынке он имеет свою мастерскую. У Шухрата очень много клиентов, так как в течении 15 лет мастерский выполняет свою работу. Он от доходов этого бизнеса содержит свою семью, а также помогает семье брата. Шухрат запрашивает займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки сырья. Он надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Shuhrat is married and a loving father of four children. He works with tin and is a very skilled and experienced craftsman. He inherited this business from his father and has a workshop at the produce market. After 15 years of masterfully performing his work, Shuhrat has many clients. With the profits from this business, he supports his family and also helps out the family of his brother. Shuhrat is requesting a loan of 4000 somoni to buy raw materials. He hopes for your help and support.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for his tin workshop

loans.name: Suhair

texts.en:
Suhair is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. Instead, the man in the photo is her husband.

Suhair is a 36-year-old married woman from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children. Suhair is looking to improve her family's living conditions. Thus, she is requesting a loan of 800 JD to do maintenance on her house. An aspiration of Suhair is to increase the space of her house so that her children can have separate rooms.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en:
Cristita is 50 years old and married with three children.  She works hard to provide for her family. 

Cristita runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has been in business for nine years and also earns income from a videoke (video karaoke) rental business.  She has requested a loan of 12,000 PHP through NWTF in order to purchase more items to stock and sell in her store. Cristita has previously borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF.

Cristita aspires to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to stock and sell in her store.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila is 40 years old and married with six children.

Cirila works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell.

Cirila has borrowed and paid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and also earns an income from food vending.

Cirila aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell.

loans.name: Juanito

texts.en:
Juanito is from Sta. Ana Aloran, Misamis, Occidental. He is 36 years old. He is married and has two children. To make a living, Juanito owns and operates a business providing transportation services to the local community. He has been engaged in his business for nine years and earns approximately 2,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2011, Juanito joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Juanito is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to repair a transport vehicle for better services. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle for better services

loans.name: Sharla

texts.en:
Forty-year-old Sharla is a married woman with three children aged twelve, ten and three. She and her husband run a fishing business in Bien Unido, Bohol, which they started twelve years ago. Sharla lives in one of the towns of her island. Sharla works hard to support her family. She also plans to save for her children's education especially now that her eldest is graduating from elementary. Sharla has to send her child to a high-school on the mainland.

Sharla has requested a loan to purchase a boat engine. Sharla hopes to expand their business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a boat engine.

loans.name: Vat

texts.en:
From Kompong Cham province, Mrs. Vat, aged twenty-five, is a young mother of a small kid. She cultivates rice alongside her husband to make their livelihood. Because of the size of the farmland she possesses, Mrs. Vat has a low profit. That’s why she has to try hard both in the dry season and the rainy season to have an increasing output. 
 
At present, she has applied for a loan from HKL and Kiva to rent some land and to purchase farming materials such as rice seeds, mineral fertilizers and pesticides. With the remaining funds, she’ll buy piglets to raise behind her house. Through this loan, Mrs. Vat hopes that her business will improve thereby increasing her household income.

loans.use: to rent land and to purchase farming materials such as rice seeds, mineral fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Fatimah

texts.en:
Fatimah is a 39-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of seven children.

Fatimah is looking to improve her family's living conditions. Thus, she is requesting a loan of 400 JD to do maintenance on her house

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Nehayah

texts.en:
Nehayah is a 41-year-old married woman from Al Nasse, Amman, Jordan and a mother of five children.

Nehayah is a tailor. She is working from home and looking to increase her capital so that she can expand her business.

Nehayah is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase materials needed such as strings and fabrics. 

An aspiration of Nehayah's is to purchase a car for the family and ensure her children's education expenses.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as strings (thread) and fabrics

loans.name: Caridad

texts.en: This time, Caridad is applying for a loan of PHP 20,000 to fund her charcoal retail business. The charcoal retail business that she previously funded through NWTF and Kiva continues to provide her additional capital to build and expand her business operations.

loans.use: to purchase additional charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.en:
MARCO Trucking of McAllen, Texas is a one-truck business that hauls freight across the United States run by Miguel. For Miguel, hauling is second nature as he grew up watching his father work for a trucking business. He was attracted to this career because he was able to choose his own hours and have more time for his four children. Two of his children are under the age of 18 and depend on him financially. 

For 30 years, Miguel has driven trucks. Previously, he worked for another company but decided he wanted to work for himself by contracting through other companies with his own truck. He has now had his own business for 10 years. In the future, he plans to hire an additional employee. Miguel will use his loan to purchase tires and shocks for his truck. The one-stop maintenance will help him avoid making multiple and time-consuming stops at repair shops.

He said the loan will help keep his truck in good working order. In turn, this will help him make more money for his family. He said, “Thanks to ACCION for helping people out. The economy is pretty hard.”

loans.use: to purchase tires and shocks for his truck

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is from the village of Transville Villaflor.  He is 30 years old, married and has two children. 

Daniel used his previous loan to invest in expanding his business.  As a result, his business grew and became successful.   At present, Daniel is requesting a new loan to purchase more computers and expand his product offering.  He hopes to be able to further grow his business.

loans.use: to purchase more computers and expand his product offering

loans.name: William Gilberto

texts.es:
William es un hombre de 46 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su unidad educativa. 

Su historia empezó como maestro hace mas de 15 años, por el Guasmo sur tiene sus clases ya que su madre era maestra y fue de ella de quien heredo ese don, trabaja junto a su esposa de 7:30 AM a 12:30 PM – 2:00PM a 4:00PM, ha tenido problemas con sus padres de familia que por momentos no entienden que la educación va unido a la disciplina y a veces las sanciones son mal vistas por ellas y esto se complementan para mal con la peligrosidad del sector, está casado la esposa es maestra de escuela particular y pensión de cada clase particular junto con su esposo, tiene 2 hijos. 

Su sueño es que desea que sus hijos terminen su carrera universitaria y para esto les dará todo su apoyo y lograr terminar su casa para tener una mejor vida familiar. Por eso quiere el préstamo para invertir en los estudios de sus hijos y la otra parte para su vivienda.
texts.en:
William is 46years old and has great plans for the success of his educational unit in the coming years.

His story as a teacher begins more than 15 years ago. His mother was also a teacher and he believes that he inherited his gift for teaching from her. He works alongside his wife from 7:30am until 12:30pm and from 2:00pm until 4:00pm. He has had a few problems with some of the pupils' parents who do not understand that education and discipline go hand in hand, and occasionally his punishments have not been well received by parents and this adds to the already present dangers within his sector.
His wife is a teacher in a private boarding school where she teaches each class alongside her husband. They have 2 children.
His dream is for his children to finish their university courses, so he intends to give them all his support to do so. He also hopes to finish building his house so that he can improve his home life. Consequently, he wants to invest part of the loan in his children's studies and another part in his home.

loans.use: to pay for his children's studies, their rent and books.

loans.name: Juralyn

texts.en:
Juralyn is 28 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is married and has two children. 

Juralyn has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages.  She has been in business for five years.  She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to  increase her stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

Juralyn is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, Juralyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Sem

texts.en:
Sem is a 52-year-old married woman who operates a retail business in her neighborhood for an extra profit. She sells many types of products to satisfy her customers including sweets, groceries, canned foods, biscuits, household things, etc.  She is a mother of six children. Two of her children are single and live together with her in Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province.

Recently her store has run out of supplies. Therefore, Sem has applied for a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase merchandise to maintain her business and support its growth. She hopes that our lenders won’t reject her first loan, which will be used to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to sell

loans.name: Flor Maria

texts.es:
Flor es una mujer de 28 de años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar sus confecciones de ropa. 

Su historia empezó a la edad de 22 años no pudo estudiar ni siquiera academia, pero por medio de un curso de 3 meses aprendió muchas cosas de costura lo cual en la actualidad le ayudado a superarse, su trabajo lo realiza sola y no tiene horario fijo, su dificultad es cuando su niño se le enferma, si está casada el señor es jubilado, tiene cinco estudian en escuela fiscal. 

Su sueño como ya tiene mucha experiencia y varios maquinas quiere tener su propio local ya que lo que las empresas de las revistas le pagan poco por cada prenda. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar una maquina recubridora, telas, hilos.
texts.en:
Flor is a woman of 28, and has many ambitions for making her sewing business prosper in the next few years. Her story begins when she was 22, and wasn't able to go to school, not even to a vocational school. But by means of a three-month course, she learned many things about sewing, which now has helped her to improve herself. 

She works on her own, and doesn't have fixed hours. It is difficult for her when her small child is sick. She is married, and her husband is retired. She has five children who go to public school. 

Her dream, now that she has a lot of experience and several machines, is to have her own shop, since what the companies in the magazines pay for each article of clothing is little. That's why she wants the loan to buy a coverstitch machine, fabric and thread.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, and a coverstitch machine

loans.name: Kerto Sato Group

texts.en: Ni Ketut took another loan because she wants to purchase four piglets. She used her last profit to purchase a young pig, which become a sow.  Now she has one sow, one young pig and four piglets. Her husband supports her business by helping her to clean the barn and give the pig feed everyday. She has a plan to become a piglet seller in her village. She hopes that during this period, the sow and piglets will grow healthy and the sow will give a lot of healthy piglets.

loans.use: To purchase four piglets

loans.name: Ulanoi

texts.ru: Уланой замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Более 3 лет  она занимается выращиванием сельхоз и бахчевых культур. В основном Уланой выращивает лук, пшеницу и кукурузу. Кроме выращивания сельхозкультур она занимается откормом крупного рогатого скота. В бизнесе помогают дочь и супруг. Уланой хотела бы получить займ в размере 5500 Сомони для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и скота. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Ulanoi is married and the loving mother of four children. She has been engaged in cultivation of agricultural crops and melons for more than 3 years. Ulanoi primarily grows onions, wheat and sweet corn. Besides growing crops, she is also engaged in fattening cattle. Her daughter and husband helps with the business. 

Ulanoi would like to receive a loan in the amount of 5500 somoni for the purchase of seeds, mineral fertilizer and cattle. She hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizers and cattle

loans.name: Asri Lestari Group

texts.en: Because the price for feed is expensive, the Asri Lestari group continues to borrow a loan from MUK. They purchased piglets with the last profit. Ni Nyoman used her loan to purchase piglets and feed. From the last profit, she purchased two piglets and with the loan, she purchased two more piglets. She will keep them for six months for fattening. She hopes that during this period she can sell the pigs at a high price. She will continue to renovate her house with the profit.

loans.use: To purchase two piglets and pig feed.

loans.name: Ross

texts.es: Ross, de 22 años, es una joven mujer que tiene muchos deseos de superarse y poder triunfar en la vida. Trabaja mucho para así poder brindar una mejorar condición de vida a su hermana, a quien apoya en sus estudios. El trabajo de Ross consiste en la venta de comida y bebidas, a diario en su casa atiende a sus clientes en un espacio que acondiciono para brindar comodidad. Ahí les expende comida y bebida. Lleva realizando su trabajo por dos años y tiene la ayuda de su madre de quien aprendió la buena sazón y el buen trato que siempre hay que brindar al cliente. Le gusta su trabajo pues le permite estar en constante actividad durante el día y así generar ingresos para su hogar, además que le da tiempo por las noches de ir a estudiar ya que desea ser profesional en el futuro. Espera seguir trabajando y progresar, y mas adelante montar un restaurante en algún lugar céntrico de la ciudad. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, esta muy emocionada de saber que le darán un respaldo económico para continuar con sus planes,por ello  no quiere dejar de pagar sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para poder continuar con su negocio ya que desea variar los platillos que ofrece a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ross is 22, and a young woman who has a great desire to improve herself and succeed in life. She works hard to be able to offer her sister, whose studies she is supporting, a better situation in life.

Ross sells food and drinks. She has been doing her work for two years, and has her mother's help. From her she learned the delicious cooking and good service that one always has to offer the customer. 

She likes her work, as it allows her to be working constantly during the day, earning income for her household. In addition, it allows her time in the evenings to go to school, as she wishes to be a professional in the future. She hopes to continue working and making progress, and someday set up a restaurant in some central location in the city. 

This will be her second loan with MFP, and she is very excited to know that she will given financial support to continue with her plans. Therefore, she doesn't wish to miss paying her installments. 

With the amount of 1,500 soles applied for, she will buy ingredients and supplies, enabling her to continue with her business, as she wishes to vary the dishes that she offers to her customers.

loans.use: To buy more ingredients and supplies for making food.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 40 años, es una mujer amable y muy buena. Convive con Constantino de 40 años con quien tiene cuatro hijos, Anderson de 18, Luzvimar de 16, Mayte de 8 y Yuri de 6 años. Juntos vien en su casa propia. Todos los días, desde muy temprano, Rosa se dirige al mercado mas cerca de su casa, en busca de los ingredientes y carnes más frescas y al volver a su casa, comienza con la preparación de los platos mas exquisitos. Es muy conocida, ya que tiene una excelente sazón y un modo particular de adornar sus diferentes platos que ofrece en su restaurante ubicado en su propia inmueble. Lleva realizando este trabajo por dos años y lo hace con la ayuda de dos personas a quienes contrata de manera semanal. Le agrada mucho su trabajo, pues le permite tener tiempo por las tardes para poder compartir con su familia, además que le genera buenas ventas y con las ganancias, espera ampliar y mejorar la infraestructura de su restaurante, donde pueda vender mucho mas y brindar mas comodidad a sus clientes. Este será el primer préstamo con MFP, está muy contenta por que le brindaran un respaldo financiero y así podrá aumentar su capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para poder brindar mayor variedad de platos de comida a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rosa, 40, is a very nice, friendly woman. She lives with Constantino, also 40, with whom she has four children: Anderson, 18, Luzvimar, 16, Mayte, 8, and Yuri, 6. They live in their own house. 

Very early everyday Rosa goes to the market nearest her house looking for the freshest meat and other ingredients. Upon returning home, she starts preparing the most delicious dishes. She is very well known for the excellent flavor of her food and her unique way of garnishing the  different dishes she sells in her restaurant, which is located on her own property. She has been doing this work for two years and she does it with the help of two people she hires on a weekly basis. She enjoys her work very much since it enables her to spend time with her family in the afternoons and it also generates good sales. With her profits she hopes to expand and improve her restaurant’s infrastructure so she can sell much more and provide a more comfortable setting for her customers.

This will be her first loan with MFP. She is very happy because they provide financial support so she will be able to increase her working capital. With the 1,000 soles requested, she will buy ingredients and supplies in order to offer a greater variety of food for her customers.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies to prepare more food.

loans.name: Gabriela Carolina

texts.es:
Gabriela es una mujer de 25 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de ropa.

Todo empezó como ventas de ropa interior y escogí esta actividad porque dispongo de ello mi trabajo es en la mañana de 9 a las 12 mis dificultades es retraso en los pagos no estoy casada tengo un hijo. 

Su sueño es ser profesional e incrementar las ventas y ampliar el negocio. Es por eso que solicito el préstamo  para comprar ropa para tener mas ingresos para mejorar su economia.
texts.en:
Gabriela, 26, is a woman with many aspirations of prospering with her clothing business in the next few years.

All began when she sold underwear.  She says that “I chose this business because I can do my work in the mornings from 9-12.  My problems are the delay in payments by customers.  I’m not married and I have a son”.

Her dream is to be a professional and to increase her sales and enlarge her business.  That is why she requested the loan-to buy clothing to have more earnings and to improve her financial situation.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE JUNTOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hilda; ella tiene 44 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en un empresa pública y también la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de cuyes, ella vende en las diferentes lugares como mercados y ferias, la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cuyes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "Siempre Juntos" (Always Together) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The member is Hilda.  She is 44 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her work in a public company.  She also has a business selling guinea pigs.  She makes her sales in different places such as indoor and open-air markets.  Through this business, she provides for her children.  Hilda's dream is to have a sales location from which to sell her guinea pigs.  She is requesting this loan to buy guinea pigs wholesale.

Hilda is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs wholesale

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE JUNTOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Teresa; ella tiene 60 años de edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, ella vende en forma independiente, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales.
